topic_description: Learn core DSA concepts and techniques used in interviews and CP.
lesson_content: Arrays are linear data structures used to store elements in contiguous memory locations.
question_text: What is the time complexity of accessing an element in an array?
explanation: Array index access is O(1) due to direct memory referencing.
article_content: Arrays are fundamental structures in programming and appear in almost every coding challenge.

topic_description: Master the concepts of classes, objects, inheritance, and more.
lesson_content: A class is a user-defined blueprint from which objects are created. It defines a set of properties and methods.
question_text: Which of the following defines a class in Python?
explanation: In Python, a class is defined using the "class" keyword.
article_content: Object-Oriented Programming helps structure code into reusable blueprints called classes.
